File loader

Quite some libs make use of a XML file, could this be abstracted a bit to minimize code duplication? Especially error handling and actually parsing the data into the objects.


Check all of sueastside's code

It's most likely bugged in more then one way, not to mention design flaws!

Todos taken from code comments

client.cpp

  • Make it actually delete all entities at disconnect like it claims to do...

chat/chatmanager.cpp

  • input command handler. (not sure what this means, maybe something similar to the events but for chat commands)

chat/commands.h

  • Turn and wave to the target for /greet
  • Write a pose manager to look up the IDs of poses

entity/entity.h

  • Recheck if the convenience constructor for Entity to set ID is actually needed
  • Entity::Create() might be unneeded and even somewhat harmful, maybe this should be moved to the constructor instead
  • Reconsider if it should really be possible to set the ID of an entity after its creation, with Entity::SetId (I guess that kinda conflicts with the first entity.h todo though), same with SetType and SetCelEntity

entity/entitymanager.cpp

  • Make a better solution for setting another camera mode for mounts

entity/character/characterentity.cpp

  • Fix the turning on mouse movement properly
  • Get the hard-coded numbers out of Pose(..) (again about pose manager)

entity/character/characterentity.h

  • Document what blend_factor is (for PlayAnimation(..))

entity/door/doorentity.h

  • Consider if we should allow setting a door's ID after its creation

entity/item/itementity.h

  • "At this time we only have this class for representing items. Possibly to change in future." - Make itementity handle more than items?
  • Deprecate itemId

entity/mount/mountentity.h

  • Consider changing Mount(Entity* player) to Mount(PcEntity* player) since it gets cast to PcEntity anyway
  • Same with UnMount(..)

gui/book-gui.cpp

  • Move book reading and writing to a manager

gui/interactdialog-gui.cpp

  • Check if the "get a free slot for this!" todo isn't already done yet, if it is then remove the todo comment
  • Make behaviours listen to the interface.interact event and on that event register their action(s) with a callback to the interact-window which will create a button for each callback

network/environmenthandler.cpp

  • Make it handle weather messages

network/playerhandler.cpp

  • Move the adding of skills into the skills list to the skills window
